product.title: Unbranded 7 in 1 Multifunctional Styler Curler Automatic Curling Hair Dryer 1400W Powerful Straightener Set US Plug
product.title_excluding_brand: 7 in 1 Multifunctional Styler Curler Automatic Curling Hair Dryer 1400W Powerful Straightener Set US Plug
product.description:
[ hair dryer hot air comb modeling]
[Easy to replace the brush head]
[Practical and Portable]
[ for family and friend]

Colour:As Shown
Material:High temperature nylon
Plug Type:US Plug, it applies to Canada, India, Mexico, Thailand, , the , the Philippines and so on.
voltage: AC110V
Rated voltage: 110/220V
Rated frequency: 50-60Hz
Power: 1100/1400W
Performance: Wind speed 16M/S, wind pressure 108g, noise 84dB
Heating element: heating wire
Temperature: room temperature, second gear 70 ℃, third gear 110 ℃
Wind speed gear: 3rd gear
Line length: 2 meters
Low noise, good curling effect, and fast drying speed
Curly air Use
STEP 1: Take a strand of hair open the switch
: Keep the curling iron in a vertical position
STEP 3: Let the hair automatically suck into the curling iron
STEP 4: Stay 10-,can choice the time according to the customers favorite
STEP 5: Loosen the curling iron
STEP 6: Curly hair success
Due to different batches, there may be differences in product appearance and printed text, which not affect use

Package Contents:
1 set * 7 in 1 multi-function high-speed hair dryer

Only the above package content, other products are not included.
Note: Light reflection and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the real thing. The measurement allowed error is +/- 1-3cm.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
